name: Wikipedia - Clean, readable
description: by grom. Works in 2014, on Firefox, Chrome, Opera. Removes *everything* except articles and search box. Lets you focus on reading. Simple, unobtrusive layout; Table of Contents compacted to top-right corner until mouse-hovered. This is a layout style. For different colors, read additional info below.
obsoletion_message:
Please use style 13893 instead of this one.
Night version of it is style 36778.

1) http://userstyles.org/styles/13893/modernwiki
2) http://userstyles.org/styles/36778/modernwiki-night
additional_info:
For different color sets, also add one of these styles:
→ style 63608
→ style 64023
→ style 65252
→ style 64085

Works on most Wikimedia sites, such as wikipedia.org, wikimedia.org, wiktionary.org, wikiquote.org, wikibooks.org, wikisource.org, wikinews.org, wikiversity.org and mediawiki.org

Latest changes:
2014-09-27 - minor fix for some search buttons.
2013-09-19 - fixed the new "VisualEditor", again.
2013-08-05 - fixed the new "VisualEditor".
2013-07-28 - fixed the new Table of Contents.
2013-05-31 - added wikivoyage.org domain.
2013-02-26 - fixed the crazy Wikipedia blunder they've made today with their updates; added wikidata.org domain.

You can also try some derivative works by other authors, which used this style as their base:
